Duplicate Group

Use the Duplicate Group dialog box (Admin | Security | Access List Groups | Duplicate button) to duplicate the selected access list group.

Field Descriptions

Name Enter the name of the new access list group. The name cannot begin or end with a tab or blank space. Any character can be used in the name except * : \ ' " ( )
Duplicate from Displays the name of the group you selected to duplicate.
Copy group members Select this check box to copy the existing group's members to the new access list group.
Copy privileges Select this check box to copy the existing group's privileges to the new access list group.

See Also

Create Access List Group Dialog Box
